ingredient.name: Chicken Breast
ingredient.gastronomy: Excellent flavor and texture, versatile in many dishes
ingredient.health: High in protein, low in fat

ingredient.name: Tomatoes
ingredient.gastronomy: Add bright, acidic flavor to dishes
ingredient.health: Good source of vitamin C and lycopene

ingredient.name: Garlic
ingredient.gastronomy: Adds depth of flavor to dishes
ingredient.health: May have health benefits, such as boosting the immune system

ingredient.name: Salmon
ingredient.gastronomy: Rich, buttery flavor and flaky texture
ingredient.health: High in omega-3 fatty acids, good for heart health
ingredient.budget: Can be expensive, but can be found at a reasonable price

ingredient.name: Quinoa
ingredient.health: High in protein and fiber, gluten-free

ingredient.name: Broccoli
ingredient.gastronomy: Adds crunch and green color to dishes
ingredient.health: High in vitamins K and C, and fiber

ingredient.name: Avocado
ingredient.health: High in healthy fats, good for heart health
ingredient.budget: Can be expensive, depending on the season and location
